name: Cave Tale
description:
A quick entry for LD 36. This time around I didn't have time to participate but still threw a game together just for fun during my spare time. Made in about 2-3 hours.

Programming: Ainoras Žukauskas(Me)

Art: Mira Jaakonsaari

Stone sound: https://www.freesound.org/people/thanvannispen/sounds/29986/
